summary: This document is an email chain forwarded by Mark Epstein on September 22, 2021, with the subject 'JES' and a brief, concerning description of injuries including a blood vessel in the eye like strangulation, bruises to the mouth, and a bruise to the back of the neck. The email is sent to Stacey Richman.

persons.name: Mark Epstein
persons.context: Mark Epstein forwarded an email on September 22, 2021, with the subject 'JES' containing a description of injuries.

persons.name: Stacey Richman
persons.context: Stacey Richman is the recipient of the email from Mark Epstein regarding the subject 'JES' and injury descriptions.

events.title: Email regarding injuries
events.description: Mark Epstein forwarded an email to Stacey Richman with the subject 'JES' describing injuries including a blood vessel in the eye like strangulation, bruises to the mouth, and a bruise to the back of the neck.

keyFacts: An email from Mark Epstein to Stacey Richman on September 22, 2021, describes injuries including a blood vessel in the eye resembling strangulation.
The email subject 'JES' may refer to Jeffrey Epstein, suggesting the injuries could be related to him.
The described injuries (bruises to mouth, back of neck, and eye) are consistent with signs of physical trauma or assault.
